price: 33. Oyo azalaki kobanga Ar- Rahmán, ata azali kornona ye te, mpe ayei na motema ya kotubela.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
